data.name: Odin
data.description: The All-Father, King of Asgard, and protector of the Nine Realms, Odin uses his mystical spear and an ancient energy known as The Odinforce to blast enemies with an onslaught of devastating attacks.

starItems.name: Odin
starItems.description: The All-Father, King of Asgard, and protector of the Nine Realms, Odin uses his mystical spear and an ancient energy known as The Odinforce to blast enemies with an onslaught of devastating attacks.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to them.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from all enemies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to them.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to them.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to them.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to them.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from all enemies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to them.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Steal <color=#86e619>3%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to self. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and this attack redistributes a maximum of <color=#86e619>6%</color> of this character's Max Health per target

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + steal <color=#86e619>3%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to self. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and this attack redistributes a maximum of <color=#86e619>6%</color> of this character's Max Health per target.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to them.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If this character has used their Basic, Counterattack, or Assist, clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.
1.nextUpgrade:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect into a positive effect on self and all allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect into a positive effect on self and all allies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If this character has used their Basic, Counterattack, or Assist, clear all Battlefield Effects on enemy side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color>, to enemy side.

If <color=#f4ca11>All-Father's Fury</color> is active at the start of an enemy turn, on enemy turn end, Odin will use his Basic - Gungnir's Onslaught, at the Basic's unlocked level.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect into a positive effect on self and all allies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, cannot be Blocked, and cannot be counterattacked.

2.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, cannot be Blocked, and cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

3.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, cannot be Blocked, and cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Flip all positive effects into negative effects for all enemies

4.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>290%</color> Piercing + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, cannot be Blocked, and cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to self. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and this attack redistributes a maximum of <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health per target

5.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to self. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and this attack redistributes a maximum of <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health per target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, cannot be Blocked, and cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

6.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to self. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and this attack redistributes a maximum of <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health per target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, cannot be Blocked, and cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies

7.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to self. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and this attack redistributes a maximum of <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health per target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, cannot be Blocked, and cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
This character cannot be revived.
On ally Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
On enemy Turn, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, down to a minimum of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
On Turn, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When this character loses their last <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, generate <color=#86e619>10</color> Ultimate Ability Energy for self.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed.
The Speed of this character can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
This character cannot gain <color=#fff568>Minor Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, or <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed

The Speed of this character can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
This character cannot gain <color=#fff568>Minor Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, or <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed

3.description:
This character cannot be revived.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>75%</color> Speed.
The Speed of this character can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
This character cannot gain <color=#fff568>Minor Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, or <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
